R0_StudyID.name: StudyID
R0_StudyID.description: Unique 6-digit identifier for each participant in the study.

R0_DOB_Day.name: DOB_day
R0_DOB_Day.question: What is your date of birth?

R0_CountryBorn.name: Country_1
R0_CountryBorn.question: In which country were you born?

R0_CountryBornNonUK.name: CountryOthe
R0_CountryBornNonUK.question: If not the UK, which country were you born in?
R0_CountryBornNonUK.description: Participant's country of birth if not the UK.

R0_TownRegBorn.name: BirthPlace
R0_TownRegBorn.question: In which town or region were you born?
R0_TownRegBorn.description: Participant's town or region of birth.

R0_BornHosp_Other.name: Q2_4_1_1
R0_BornHosp_Other.question: Were you born in a hospital or at some other place?
R0_BornHosp_Other.description: Participant's place of birth (e.g., hospital, home).

R0_HospName.name: Q2_4_2
R0_HospName.question: Hospital/nursing home name
R0_HospName.description: Name of the hospital/nursing home where the participant was born.

R0_BirthPlace_Other.name: Q2_4_3
R0_BirthPlace_Other.question: Other birth place
R0_BirthPlace_Other.description: Participant's other specified birth place details.

R0_Single_Twin.name: Q2_5_1
R0_Single_Twin.question: Are you a twin or single born?
R0_Single_Twin.description: Whether the participant was born as a single, twin, or triplet/higher.

R0_TwinFemale.name: Q2_6_1_1
R0_TwinFemale.question: If a twin, is your co-twin also female?
R0_TwinFemale.description: Whether the participant's co-twin is female.

R0_TwinType.name: Q2_6_2_1
R0_TwinType.question: Are you identical or non-identical twins?
R0_TwinType.description: Whether the participant and their twin are identical or non-identical.

R0_TwinType_Parents.name: Q2_6_3_1
R0_TwinType_Parents.question: How do you know about whether you are identical or non-identical twins? Parents told us
R0_TwinType_Parents.description: Whether the participant's twin type was confirmed by parents.

R0_TwinType_Doctor.name: Q2_6_4_1
R0_TwinType_Doctor.question: How do you know about whether you are identical or non-identical twins? Doctor said so
R0_TwinType_Doctor.description: Whether the participant's twin type was confirmed by a doctor.

R0_TwinType_Blood.name: Q2_6_5_1
R0_TwinType_Blood.question: How do you know about whether you are identical or non-identical twins? Blood test
R0_TwinType_Blood.description: Whether the participant's twin type was confirmed by blood test.

R0_TwinType_AppSim.name: Q2_6_6_1
R0_TwinType_AppSim.question: How do you know about whether you are identical or non-identical twins? We look similar
R0_TwinType_AppSim.description: Whether the participant's twin type was inferred from similar appearance.

R0_TwinType_AppDif.name: Q2_6_7_1
R0_TwinType_AppDif.question: How do you know about whether you are identical or non-identical twins? We look different
R0_TwinType_AppDif.description: Whether the participant's twin type was inferred from different appearance.

R0_TwinType_Other.name: Q2_6_8_1
R0_TwinType_Other.question: How do you know about whether you are identical or non-identical twins? Other reasons
R0_TwinType_Other.description: Other reasons for knowing the participant's twin type.

R0_TwinMist_Parents.name: Q2_7_1_1
R0_TwinMist_Parents.question: As children, were you and your twin mistaken for each other by: Parents
R0_TwinMist_Parents.description: Whether the participant and their twin were mistaken by parents.

R0_TwinMist_Siblings.name: Q2_7_2_1
R0_TwinMist_Siblings.question: As children, were you and your twin mistaken for each other by: brothers and sisters
R0_TwinMist_Siblings.description: Whether the participant and their twin were mistaken by siblings.

R0_TwinMist_ClseFrnds.name: Q2_7_3_1
R0_TwinMist_ClseFrnds.question: As children, were you and your twin mistaken for each other by: close friends
R0_TwinMist_ClseFrnds.description: Whether the participant and their twin were mistaken by close friends.

R0_TwinMist_CasFrnds.name: Q2_7_4_1
R0_TwinMist_CasFrnds.question: As children, were you and your twin mistaken for each other by: casual friends
R0_TwinMist_CasFrnds.description: Whether the participant and their twin were mistaken by casual friends.

R0_TwinMist_Clssmts.name: Q2_7_5_1
R0_TwinMist_Clssmts.question: As children, were you and your twin mistaken for each other by: class-mates
R0_TwinMist_Clssmts.description: Whether the participant and their twin were mistaken by classmates.

R0_TwinSimilarity.name: Q2_8_1
R0_TwinSimilarity.question: When growing up, were you described as being
R0_TwinSimilarity.description: How the participant and their twin were described during childhood.

R0_MatPregWks.name: Q2_9_1
R0_MatPregWks.question: How many weeks was your mother pregnant with you?
R0_MatPregWks.description: Number of weeks the participant's mother was pregnant with them.

R0_MatPregWks_Unkn.name: Q2_9_2
R0_MatPregWks_Unkn.question: Don't know (weeks your mother pregnant with you)?
R0_MatPregWks_Unkn.description: Participant does not know the weeks of maternal pregnancy.

R0_BirthExpEarlyLate.name: Q2_9_3_1
R0_BirthExpEarlyLate.question: Do you know roughly whether you were born about the time expected or earlier or later?
R0_BirthExpEarlyLate.description: Whether the participant was born early, on time, or late.

R0_BirthWght_Lbs.name: Q2_10_lbs
R0_BirthWght_Lbs.question: What was your birth weight? (Lbs)
R0_BirthWght_Lbs.description: Participant's birth weight in pounds. Maximum set at 15 pounds as heaviest recorded birth in UK was 15 pounds, 8 ounces.

R0_BirthWght_Oz.name: Q2_10_oz
R0_BirthWght_Oz.question: What was your birth weight? (oz)
R0_BirthWght_Oz.description: Participant's birth weight in ounces. This variable works in conjunction with pounds. Every increase of 16 ounces is another pound.

R0_BirthWght_G.name: Q2_10_grams
R0_BirthWght_G.question: What was your birth weight? (Grams)
R0_BirthWght_G.description: Participant's birth weight in grams. Maximum set to equivalent of grams for 15 pounds, 8 ounces.

R0_BirthWght_Cat.name: Q2_10_told_1
R0_BirthWght_Cat.question: If you do not know your birth weight, have you been told that you were:

R0_MatPrevPreg.name: Q2_11_preg
R0_MatPrevPreg.question: How many pregnancies did your mother have before you were born?
R0_MatPrevPreg.description: Number of pregnancies the participant's mother had before them. Maximum is max number of pregnancies in cohort for all rounds of questionnaire.

R0_MatPrevPreg_Unkn.name: Q2_11_dn
R0_MatPrevPreg_Unkn.question: Don't know how many pregnancies your mother have before you were born?
R0_MatPrevPreg_Unkn.description: Participant does not know the number of maternal pregnancies.

R0_Delivery_Caesarean.name: Q2_12_1_1
R0_Delivery_Caesarean.question: Were you delivered by caesarean section?
R0_Delivery_Caesarean.description: Whether the participant was delivered by caesarean section.

R0_Caesarean_Reason.name: Q2_12_2
R0_Caesarean_Reason.question: If caesarean, please specify the reason
R0_Caesarean_Reason.description: Reason for the participant's caesarean delivery.

R0_Mother_PreEclampsia.name: Q2_13_1
R0_Mother_PreEclampsia.question: Did your mother have pre-eclampsia or eclampsia during pregnancy with you?
R0_Mother_PreEclampsia.description: Whether the participant's mother had pre-eclampsia/eclampsia.

R0_Mother_PregComp.name: Q2_14_1_1
R0_Mother_PregComp.question: Did your mother have other complications during pregnancy with you?
R0_Mother_PregComp.description: Whether the participant's mother had other pregnancy complications.

R0_PregComp_Details.name: Q2_14_2
R0_PregComp_Details.question: If any complications, please specify
R0_PregComp_Details.description: Details of the participant's mother's pregnancy complications.

R0_Postnatal_Incubator.name: Q2_15_1
R0_Postnatal_Incubator.question: Were you nursed in an incubator or special care unit after birth?
R0_Postnatal_Incubator.description: Whether the participant was nursed in an incubator/special care after birth.

R0_Birth_MedAbnorm.name: Q2_16_1_1
R0_Birth_MedAbnorm.question: Did you have any medical or physical abnormalities present when you were born?
R0_Birth_MedAbnorm.description: Whether the participant had medical/physical abnormalities at birth.

R0_MedAbnorm_Dets.name: Q2_16_2
R0_MedAbnorm_Dets.question: If any medical or physical abnormalities present, please specify
R0_MedAbnorm_Dets.description: Details of the participant's medical abnormalities at birth.
